description: This file defines a Flutter widget called OceanSearchBar, which is a customizable, ocean-styled search bar with features like leading search icon, clear button, immediate onChanged callback, and debounced onDebounced callback.

classes.name: OceanSearchBar
classes.description: A customizable, ocean-styled search bar widget with debounce and immediate callback functionalities.

classes.name: _OceanSearchBarState
classes.description: State class managing the internal behavior and rendering of OceanSearchBar.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: _onChanged
methods.description: Handles text change events, triggers callbacks, and manages debounce timer.

methods.name: _clear
methods.description: Clears the text input and triggers the onChanged callback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, including the TextField with prefix and suffix icons.
